attributes.action: Make Gumtree tighten rules on animals free to good home and monitor the site
attributes.background: Stop the sale of animals for £1-00 and free to good home,  the escalating of dog fighting leaves these animals to face an unknown future, also left Un neutered these animals are left as breeding machines, this site needs to tighten rules on all animal sales.

rejection.details:
The decision about whether to sell pets or not is a matter for Gumtree, which is a private company.

You could try contacting Gumtree directly to ask them to change their policy.

Alternatively, you could start a petition asking Parliament to pass a law restricting the sale of animals on the internet.
